welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Sevilla, Colombia! Immerse yourself in the city's vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and charming architecture. We invite you to explore and discover all that this enchanting city has to offer."

restaurants.name: Riverwatch Floating Resto
restaurants.description: Riverwatch Floating Resto is a asian restaurant located in Loay.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Eden Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farfan Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Farfan Airport handles all air freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
